entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as being present in the scene.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard, standing against the ramparts and conversing with Malfoy.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: The disarmer of Dumbledore, who is trying to let Death Eaters into Hogwarts.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of dark wizards and witches that are present in the school tonight.

relationships.description: Harry sees Malfoy's pale eyes shift back to Dumbledore in the greenish glare of the Mark.
Malfoy mentions that he has 'back-up' and there are Death Eaters present in the school tonight.
Dumbledore seems to be concerned about Harry's safety, as he is standing against the ramparts and conversing with Malfoy.
Malfoy steps forwards and glances around quickly to check that he and Dumbledore are alone.
